description: Prompt templates are statements or questions meant to help users get creative without having to come up with ideas from scratch.
deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?

creative.template: Create A miniature city with colourful buildings and green trees with [iconic building]. The [iconic building] is in the centre of the image, surrounded by a blurred background with lots of [Native tree name] trees. The image has a dreamy and whimsical mood, with a shallow depth of field and a high angle view. The city looks like a toy or a model, with different styles and shapes of buildings.
creative.title: Whimsical City

problemFraming.description: Problem Framing for a new product
problemFraming.template:
Given the following problem statement:
[PROBLEM STATEMENT]

Generate a response with the following points:
1. Problem framing
2. Solution overview and recommendations
3. List down the recommended MVP Scope
4. How to ensure user adoption
5. How to measure success
8. List down similar products
9. Potential sponsor question (5 questions)
problemFraming.title: Problem Framing

shortDescription.label: Description
shortDescription.placeholder: eg: Write a funny joke that a 5 year old would understand

title: Prompt Library
